General.Name: Wuxi Commercial Mansion Grand Orient Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Commercial Mansion Grand Orient Co., Ltd. engages in departmental store retail and healthcare businesses in China. The company offers sauce ribs and other fresh cooked food products, such as sauce flavor; fontanel flavor with meat as raw materials; vegetarian products, such as dried tofu; special flavor food Single products; and gift products under the Sanfengqiao brand name. It also provides pediatric medical service for children comprising children's insurance, and diagnosis and treatment of common children's diseases, as well as children's family health services; pediatric internal medicine, child health care, and dermatology and stomatology services; daily family health management, parenting courses, and health consultation services through internet. In addition, the company engages in the production and sales of food; and the development and sales of real estate. Further, it operates department stores, supermarkets, and restaurants; and offers catering services. Additionally, the company offers food products through e-commerce platforms. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.
